summary: Completed comprehensive testing of truck parts e-commerce store. All backend APIs (30/30) and frontend functionality working correctly. Full user journey from registration to order completion tested successfully.
passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section and 6 categories
Category navigation and filtering works correctly
Search functionality works (by product name and article)
Add to cart requires authentication (proper redirect)
Cart operations (add, update quantity, remove items)
Checkout flow with address and phone validation
Account page shows user info and order history
Product catalog with proper filtering and search
